translation.en: [man] Four-star general.
There is no rank higher in the United States military.
translation.de: Es gibt keinen höheren Rang im US-Militär.

translation.en: You report only to Sec Def and POTUS, the commander in chief.
translation.de: Sie unterstehen dem Verteidigungsminister und dem Präsidenten.

translation.en: Congratulations, General Naird.
[Mark Naird] Thank you. Thank you.
It has always been my dream to command a service branch.
translation.de: Es war immer mein Traum, eine Streitkraft zu führen.

translation.en: I have been shot down, both literally and figuratively,
translation.de: Ich wurde abgeschossen, buchstäblich und im übertragenen Sinne,

translation.en: but I have always gotten back up.
All right.
My old CO used to say that the greatest asset in an F-35,
translation.de: Mein früherer Kommandant sagte immer, der größte Trumpf einer F35, das ist ein 100-Millionen-Dollar-Flugzeug,

translation.en: and that is a $100 million plane,
translation.de: der größte Trumpf einer F35, das ist ein 100-Millionen-Dollar-Flugzeug,

translation.en: is its pilot.
When I was-- All right. I'll skip ahead.
There's much more that I could say.
I only wish that...
my parents could have been here to see this.
But they were unable to get flights from New Jersey in time.
translation.de: Aber sie kriegten keinen Flug aus New Jersey.

translation.en: Maggie, Erin, this is a Naird family team win.
translation.de: Maggie, Erin, dies ist ein Sieg für die Familie Naird.

translation.en: -So proud of you. -Thanks.
I don't get it.
Dad, when you made three-star, we had 100 guests and a band.
translation.de: Dad, als du drei Sterne kriegtest, gab es 100 Gäste und eine Band.

translation.en: It's a different administration, bug. This one's... a little more chaotic.
translation.de: Das war eine andere Regierung. Diese ist etwas chaotischer.

translation.en: The Air Force chief's house in Arlington is gorgeous and comes with a staff.
translation.de: Das Haus des Air-Force-Kommandeurs in Arlington ist wunderschön.

translation.en: Thank you.
Dad, I am so proud of you.
translation.de: Dad, ich bin total stolz auf dich.

translation.en: -Thanks. -General.
Joint Chiefs in five minutes. Come on.
Get lost, Naird. This is for four-stars.
translation.de: Verschwinden Sie. Man braucht vier Sterne.

translation.en: Like me.
They didn't tell you? Or did you forget?
Like you forgot to get competitive bidding for the AT-6B.
translation.de: Wie die Ausschreibung für die AT-6B?

translation.en: Tell me what? That you wear a dress?
I knew that already.
Gender roles.
Offensive. And out of date. Just like you.
translation.de: Beleidigend und überholt, genau wie Sie.

translation.en: But I don't have to listen to it anymore.
translation.de: Ich muss das nicht mehr hören.

translation.en: Good luck with your retirement, Kick.
And I say that facetiously,
because you're a crook and a womanizer, and I hate your guts.
translation.de: Sie sind ein Gauner und Schürzenjäger. Ich hasse Sie.

translation.en: God, that felt good.
Welcome, gentlemen, thank you for joining us.
POTUS wants to make some changes.
translation.de: Der Präsident will Änderungen. Er twittert in fünf Minuten.

translation.en: He's tweeting about it in five minutes, so let's hope you like it.
translation.de: Der Präsident will Änderungen. Er twittert in fünf Minuten. Hoffentlich mögen Sie es.

translation.en: I wanna welcome our newest four-star general, Mark Naird,
translation.de: Ich begrüße als neuen Vier-Sterne-General Mark Naird, vormals Vizekommandeur der Air Force.

translation.en: formerly number two at the Air Force.
translation.de: Mark Naird, vormals Vizekommandeur der Air Force.

translation.en: He's done an amazing job, has a most distinguished career.
translation.de: Er hat in seiner Karriere tolle Arbeit geleistet.

translation.en: -Our nation's internet in-- -[Mark] Excuse me.
Why is Kick still in the room? I don't-- Hmm.
Our nation's internet, including Twitter,
runs through our vulnerable space satellites.
POTUS wants complete space dominance.
Boots on the moon by 2024.
To that end, the president is creating a new branch.
translation.de: Dafür schafft der Präsident eine neue Teilstreitkraft:

translation.en: Which Mark will run. [scoffs] Hmm? What?
In close cooperation with Air Force, which Kick will still head.
translation.de: In Zusammenarbeit mit Kicks Air Force.

translation.en: Oh, you've gotta be kidding me.
[John] This is not a joke. His words!
Boots on the moon in 2024.
Actually, he said, "Boobs on the moon," but we believe that to be a typo.
translation.de: Er schrieb "Titten auf dem Mond", aber das war wohl ein Tippfehler.

translation.en: This is bullshit. Space is part of the air.
translation.de: So ein Quatsch. Der Weltraum ist Teil der Luft.

translation.en: Naird works for me.
Uh, hang on. Hang on. I don't think there's air in space.
translation.de: Moment. Im Weltraum gibt es keine Luft.

translation.en: There certainly isn't any damn water, Admiral, so you don't get an opinion.
translation.de: Jedenfalls kein Wasser, Admiral. Seien Sie still.

translation.en: Air Force used to just be part of the Army, Kick.
translation.de: Die Air Force gehörte früher zur Armee, Kick.

translation.en: I'd like to stuff you both back in.
If there's no air or water, two questions.
translation.de: Keine Luft, kein Wasser? Zwei Fragen:

translation.en: What is it exactly, and why can't they hear you scream?
translation.de: Was ist es genau, und warum hört man keine Schreie?

translation.en: Well, at least Coast Guard isn't last in line anymore.
translation.de: Immerhin ist die Küstenwache nun nicht mehr das Letzte.

translation.en: -Oh, you're still last. -Oh, definitely last.
You're behind Salvation Army, Louis.
So, how are you handling this?
I know you wanted the Air Force, and you're not the most flexible person.
translation.de: Du wolltest die Air Force, und du bist nicht gerade flexibel.

translation.en: [Mark] I can be flexible if I'm ordered to be.
translation.de: Auf Befehl kann ich flexibel sein.

translation.en: I'll admit I was a little disappointed at first.
But then I saw this painting. John Paul Jones.
translation.de: Dann sah ich ein Gemälde. John Paul Jones.

translation.en: And it made me think.
The founder of the Space Force, that's going to be me.
translation.de: Ich werde der Gründer der Space Force sein!

translation.en: This is such a great opportunity to start something from the ground up.
translation.de: Eine tolle Gelegenheit, etwas von Grund auf zu gestalten.

translation.en: We're gonna build a huge new base.
Well, DC real estate, the way it is,
you'll be lucky if it's this side of Dulles Airport.
Oh, well, it's definitely gonna be on the other side of Dulles.
translation.de: Die Basis wird auf der anderen Seite sein.

translation.en: By about 2,000 miles.
-We're going to Colorado. -What?
There's this old NORAD facility that's got a lot of potential.
translation.de: Dort gibt es eine alte NORAD-Anlage mit viel Potenzial.

translation.en: And Colorado? Oh!
Up and coming. Did you know Amazon put their new headquarters there?
translation.de: Voll im Kommen. Amazon hat dort sein neues Hauptquartier.

translation.en: Really? No. But they seriously considered it.
You and Erin are gonna love it there.
translation.de: Du und Erin werdet es lieben.

translation.en: -Gonna learn how to ride horses. -[sobs]
[Mark] It's gonna be a good year.
And next year at this time...
translation.de: Und nächstes Jahr um diese Zeit...

translation.en: we might have boots on the moon.
translation.de: ...haben wir vielleicht Truppen auf dem Mond.

translation.en: Big launch today, huh?
Launch?
At the new base.
What base?
Oh, right. It's a secret.
If you told me, you'd have to kill me, right? [laughs]
translation.de: Wenn Sie es sagen, müssen Sie mich töten.

translation.en: ♪ That's what I wanted to be ♪
♪ But now that I am a spaceman ♪
-[Mark] Hey. -Sir.
There's a guy in the trunk. Hold him till after the launch.
Yes, sir.
What the fuck, man?
So then you say do bat your eye--
translation.de: Wenn Sie mit der Wimper zucken…

translation.en: -Big launch today, sir. -Yes.
The congressional delegation will be arriving for lunch. You have to speak for ten minutes -at the local high school. -[sighs]
translation.de: Die Kongressdelegation kommt mittags. Sie halten eine Rede an der Highschool.

translation.en: Don't worry. We have a new helo pilot. We'll get you in and out of there in no time.
translation.de: Wir haben eine neue Pilotin, die Sie hinfliegen wird.

translation.en: And the launch at 1700 is set to be a live feed on the East Coast.
translation.de: Und der Start um 17 Uhr wird live an die Ostküste übertragen.

translation.en: You have a light day today, so you can start in the gym,
translation.de: Beginnen Sie den Tag mit Fitness.

translation.en: and your calendar says it's a leg day.
Oh! Dr. Mallory is waiting for you.
Yes, he is.
-He said not to say anything. -Thank you, Brad.
[Mallory] We need to cancel the launch.
No.
Senator Schugler, Pitosi, and the angry young congresswoman are coming.
translation.de: Senator Schugler, Pitosi und die zornige Abgeordnete kommen.

translation.en: They need to see a success so we can keep our funding.
Oh. My idea of success
would not be a six-billion-dollar piece of hardware
translation.de: Erfolg bedeutet für mich nicht, eine 6 $-Milliarden-Rakete

translation.en: breaking up over Denver.
That is not going to happen.
Look, I don't like to pull rank,
-but I order you to postpone the launch. -Ah...
translation.de: aber ich befehle Ihnen, den Start zu verschieben.

translation.en: There's too much moisture in the air.
We prefer a less ionized environment.
translation.de: Wir brauchen eine weniger ionisierte Umgebung.

translation.en: You are a civilian advisor.
There are always going to be risks.
Conditions are never perfect.
They're supposed to be perfect tomorrow.
The delegation will be back in Washington tomorrow.
-You know, Mark, when I hired you... -I hired you.
translation.de: -Als ich Sie einstellte… -Ich habe Sie eingestellt.

translation.en: ...I felt your best quality was your ability to listen to good advice.
translation.de: …schätzte ich Ihre Fähigkeit, auf gute Ratschläge zu hören.

translation.en: If you've lost that, we may have to look elsewhere.
translation.de: Wenn die abhandenkam, finden wir jemand anderen.

translation.en: We. Who is this "we" that you keep talking about?
translation.de: Wer ist "wir"? Sie sagen das ständig.

translation.en: That is above your pay grade.
Nothing is above my pay grade at this base.
Just postpone the launch, dear.
Nope.
So, no launch today, I hear. No, launch is still on.
Oh. I'll have to tell the base biologist.
all the endangered lizards within 600 yards of the launch site.
translation.de: Sie muss bedrohte Echsen im Umkreis von 600 m einsammeln.

translation.en: I canceled her because Mallory told me the launch was scrubbed.
translation.de: Mallory sagte, der Start wäre abgesagt.

translation.en: No! Nobody gets to scrub anything but me.
translation.de: Nein! Nur ich kann hier etwas absagen.

translation.en: Oh. Got it, sir.
Hello, Yuri.
Oh. Uh, Yuri's in there.
-I know. -He told me not to say anything.
Thank you, Brad.
[with Russian accent] Do you keep breath mints anywhere?
What are you doing in here?
Um, I heard the launch was scrubbed.
That is not accurate, Yuri.
Call me Bobby. It's more reassuring.
translation.de: Nennen Sie mich Bobby, das klingt vertrauter.

translation.en: Can I see technical specifications for the Epsilon part E-16f fuel pump?
translation.de: Haben Sie die technischen Details der Epsilon E-16f Kraftstoffpumpe?

translation.en: Why would you need to see that?
Well, as observer from ISS partner country, I just want to... observe it.
translation.de: Als Beobachter eines ISS-Partnerstaats möchte ich sie beobachten.

translation.en: Hmm. Well, that is weird.
Your president desires close cooperation and good relations between US and Russia.
translation.de: Ihr Präsident wünscht gute Beziehungen zwischen den USA und Russland.

translation.en: Come on. We're not China here.
translation.de: Kommen Sie. Wir sind nicht China.

translation.en: I'm sure if the president would like me to show you something, he will let me know.
translation.de: Wenn der Präsident es möchte, wird er es mir mitteilen.

translation.en: Very well.
Expect a text from the secure phone.
translation.de: Die SMS kommt übers sichere Handy.

translation.en: How do you know about the secure phone?
translation.de: Woher wissen Sie vom sicheren Handy?

translation.en: I don't know about the secure phone.
-You just said "secure phone." -No, I didn't.
-Yes, you did. You said "secure phone." -I didn't say that.
You just said it.
-No, I did not. -Yes, you did.
Breath mints. Here they are.
[sergeant] ♪ I don't know but I been told ♪
[soldiers] ♪ I don't know but I been told ♪
[sergeant] ♪ Outer space is very cold ♪
[soldiers] ♪ Outer space is very cold... ♪
Yo! Oh.
-General Naird. -We may have to scrub the Epsilon launch.
-Is Yellowjacket ready to show off? -I doubt it.
Oh, for Christ's sake. They're a billion dollars and six months over.
translation.de: Sie sind $1 Milliarde und sechs Monate drüber!

translation.en: You're right. We should be able to see something.
translation.de: Es sollte etwas zu sehen geben.

translation.en: -Damn right. Let's move. -I'll make a call.
-Are you running? -No. Keep up.
Will Yellowjacket be impressive enough?
First super-pressurized ultra-fast satellite-killer killer missile?
translation.de: Es ist der erste ultraschnelle Satellitenkiller-Killer.

translation.en: Fucking impressive to me.
Oh. Hey. Looks good.
-Yeah. -[Mark] Sweet.
Very sleek. -Like the yellow fins. -Mm-hmm.
translation.de: Elegant. Ich mag die gelben Flossen.

translation.en: Do we have enough of these to do a test launch later as well?
translation.de: Haben wir genug davon für einen Teststart?

translation.en: Yes, sir.
Okay, let's do this.
-Go time. -[man on radio] Roger that, go time.
Well, that's not ready yet.
-How much was that prototype? -Four.
-Million? -Middle schools.
Cost as much as four new middle schools. Fuck!
-You are running! -Keep up.
So I hear we're going with Yellowjacket this afternoon? No.
Sorry, Sheila. Still have to grab those lizards.
Oh. Fuck Tony's in there.
-Good morning, my general. -Good morning.
I have your daily tweet ready for you to review,
translation.de: Ich habe Ihren täglichen Tweet bereit.

translation.en: and I think you're gonna love it. You're gonna eat it up. Go. Yum-yum.
translation.de: Sie werden ihn zum Fressen gern haben.

translation.en: I don't get it.
Any of it?
All right.
-You know there's a new Star Wars out? -Yes.
And Wendy's has a new hamburger that they're serving rare, so...
translation.de: Wendy's verkauft neue rohe Hamburger, also...

translation.en: So what I am saying is that if I had a lightsaber, I would be able to cook...
translation.de: Also: "Wenn ich ein Lichtschwert hätte, könnte ich...

translation.en: this hamburger better.
There you go. It took a while, but you got it.
translation.de: -Na also. Geht doch. -Was hat das mit der Mission zu tun?

translation.en: -How is this relevant to the mission? -That is culturally relevant.
translation.de: -Na also. Geht doch. -Was hat das mit der Mission zu tun? Es ist kulturell relevant.

translation.en: I don't see how being snarky about a fast-food hamburger is culturally anything.
translation.de: Was hat eine abfällige Bemerkung über Hamburger mit Kultur zu tun?

translation.en: Do you even understand what is at stake here?
translation.de: Verstehen Sie, worum es hier geht?

translation.en: I'm trying to put boots on the moon.
Boots on the moon.
A laser sword is a child's toy.
It's a lightsaber.
Did you hear yourself? Laser sword?
Okay. I think we're done.
-You don't understand because you're old. -Okay.
You get likes by dunking on the Twitter accounts
translation.de: Man kriegt Likes, wenn man Twitter-Konten

translation.en: -of sassy fast-food brands. -Sassy.
I don't even know why I'm explaining clapback theory to you.
Every time I explain anything, it seems to just go "phew."
translation.de: Jede Erklärung geht an Ihnen vorbei.

translation.en: How about this for sass?
-You're fired. -What?
Your services will no longer be needed here at Space Force.
translation.de: Die Space Force benötigt Sie nicht.

translation.en: You're firing me for writing a perfect tweet?
translation.de: Sie feuern mich für den perfekten Tweet?

translation.en: Is that why you're firing me? Fine, fine, fine. You know what?
translation.de: Sie feuern mich für den perfekten Tweet? Gut. Aber wissen Sie, was?

translation.en: Enjoy your 3,000 engineer followers, because, honestly, you are hopeless.
translation.de: Mit Ihren 3000 Ingenieur-Followern sind Sie hoffnungslos.

translation.en: -Brad. -Yes, sir.
Would you make sure that Tony is detained until after the launch
translation.de: Verhaften Sie Tony bis nach dem Start,

translation.en: so he doesn't tweet anything snotty?
-[Brad] Got it. -Thank you.
-Secure the phone. -Yes, sir.
What's going on? Are you serious? Stop--
translation.de: Was tun Sie? Ist das Ihr Ernst? Stopp!

translation.en: Siri, send tweet. Send tweet!
[gasps] Ooh, gotcha.
A little low, don't you think?
I'm flying safely, sir.
But I can lift up if you like.
At your discretion.
You're, uh-- You're rated for F-35s, aren't you, sir?
Yes, I believe I've flown every F series from the Tomcat to the F-117 Nighthawk.
translation.de: Ja. Ich bin jede F-Serie geflogen, vom Tomcat zur F117 Nighthawk.

translation.en: That's dope, sir.
What's your name?
Captain Angela Ali, sir.
ROTC?
OCS. Uh, I'm actually a prior.
I transferred as a First Class, sir.
Air Force or Space Force?
Space Force, sir.
You don't like to use your full title?
Sorry, sir. Spaceman First Class.
Nothing to be ashamed of.
Air Force has airmen. Space Force has spacemen.
translation.de: Die Air Force hat Piloten, die Space Force Raumfahrer.

translation.en: Nothing embarrassing or comical about it.
translation.de: Das ist weder peinlich, noch komisch.

translation.en: Yes, sir.
[Mark] The Earth is the only planet in our universe that we know of
translation.de: Die Erde ist der einzige Planet in unserem Universum, der unseres Wissens nach Leben ermöglicht.

translation.en: that sustains life.
translation.de: der unseres Wissens nach Leben ermöglicht.

translation.en: Fifty years ago,
Americans landed on the lunar surface and took that photo.
translation.de: machten Amerikaner auf der Mondoberfläche dieses Foto.

translation.en: Hashtag "awesome," huh?
Well, guess what, kids?
We're going back.
Not for science this time.
Not to collect a bunch of rocks. But to occupy.
translation.de: Nicht, um Steine zu sammeln, sondern als Besatzer.

translation.en: Boots on the moon!
Boots on the moon.
And even though this will be an international mission,
translation.de: Und obwohl dies eine internationale Mission ist,

translation.en: harnessing the best and brightest minds from around the globe,
translation.de: mit den besten und klügsten Köpfen der Erde,

translation.en: rest assured these will be US boots.
Boots with US feet in 'em, I mean.
Can't be certain where the boots will actually be made.
translation.de: Wer weiß, wo die Stiefel gefertigt werden.

translation.en: Maybe Mexico. Maybe Portugal. We're getting bids on the boots.
translation.de: In Mexiko oder Portugal? Die Ausschreibung läuft.

translation.en: One thing's for certain, though.
Those boots are gonna have our feet in 'em.
translation.de: Unsere Truppen stehen in den Stiefeln.

translation.en: Seniors,
if you enlist for a four-year stint as a space cadet,
translation.de: wenn ihr euch für vier Jahre als Weltraumkadett meldet,

translation.en: you can earn up to $35,000 for college.
translation.de: könnt ihr bis zu 35.000 $ fürs College verdienen.

translation.en: I don't know what else to call it but a pretty sweet deal.
translation.de: Das ist doch mal ein netter Deal.

translation.en: So what's it gonna be?
You gonna sit there like an idiot doing nothing?
translation.de: Wollt ihr untätig rumsitzen wie Idioten?

translation.en: Or are you gonna join Space Force and shoot for the stars?
translation.de: Oder kommt ihr zur Space Force und greift nach den Sternen?

translation.en: Thank you.
Thank you.
Thank you. Thanks for coming.
-We're signing up, General. -See you on the moon, gentlemen.
-Hey. -Hey, bug.
I need $100.
Bobby's taking me to the desert for a pop-up concert.
translation.de: Bobby fährt mit mir zu einem Konzert in der Wüste.

translation.en: Absolutely not. Hello.
Dad, it's fine. Just, like, give me the money.
translation.de: Dad, es ist okay. Gib mir das Geld.

translation.en: Uh, no.
Goodbye.
Okay, but you know Bobby. You work with him. I know him? Bobby who?
translation.de: -Du kennst Bobby. Du arbeitest mit ihm. -Ich kenne ihn?

translation.en: That's the Bobby that you've been seeing? He's ten years older than you.
translation.de: Das ist dein Bobby? Er ist zehn Jahre älter als du! Himmel!

translation.en: Jesus Christ, Erin.
translation.de: Er ist zehn Jahre älter als du! Himmel!

translation.en: Hello. Have a good day.
He's very sweet.
No, he's not. He is a bad, bad man.
translation.de: Nein, er ist ein schlechter Mensch.

translation.en: Well, it wasn't my idea to move to this shithole.
translation.de: Es war nicht meine Idee, in dieses Kaff zu ziehen.

translation.en: I never called this town a shithole. It's a very fine town. Very fine.
translation.de: Es ist kein Kaff, sondern ein sehr schöner Ort.

translation.en: Well, I'm going with or without you, and I guess if I have no money,
translation.de: Ich gehe ohnehin. Und wenn ich kein Geld habe,

translation.en: I'll just be totally reliant on Bobby.
translation.de: werde ich auf Bobby angewiesen sein.

translation.en: Have to do whatever Bobby says.
translation.de: Und muss tun, was Bobby sagt.

translation.en: Don't play that game with me, Erin. It's not going to work.
translation.de: Das Spiel zieht bei mir nicht, Erin.

translation.en: I'll talk it over with Mommy.
Thank you, General.
Hello.
How you doing?
Yeah.
-You eating all right? -Oh, yeah. Yeah.
They're letting me grow radishes in a window box,
translation.de: Ich darf Radieschen im Fenster anbauen

translation.en: and I can pretty much eat them whenever I want.
translation.de: und kann sie essen, wann ich will.

translation.en: -Nice. -Yeah.
And there's this guard, Louise,
she slips me some food sometimes.
Well, you look-- You look great.
[sighs] I miss you. Very much.
Mark, I'm gonna be in here a long time.
translation.de: Mark, ich werde lange hier drin sein.

translation.en: So if you need...
companionship-- No. No. No! [scoffs]
No. I am your husband.
Yes, but I'll understand if you--
Absolutely not. I don't want you to bring this up again.
translation.de: Auf keinen Fall. Erwähne es nicht.

translation.en: Please.
How's Erin?
Erin wants to go to a concert in the desert this weekend
translation.de: Erin will zu einem Konzert in der Wüste.

translation.en: with this older Russian guy, who I think is just using her to get information.
translation.de: Mit einem Russen, der sie benutzt, um Infos zu bekommen.

translation.en: Eighteen is that age where you make mistakes and figure some things out.
translation.de: Mit 18 macht man Fehler und gewinnt Erkenntnisse.

translation.en: Do you think I should let her go? Well, I just don't know how you can stop her.
translation.de: -Soll ich sie gehen lassen? -Kannst du sie aufhalten?

translation.en: Louise says if you can't do anything about a situation,
translation.de: Louise sagt, wenn man etwas nicht verhindern kann,

translation.en: you might as well lean back and let it happen.
translation.de: soll man sich zurücklehnen und es zulassen.

translation.en: -Louise sounds like a good friend. -[Maggie] Well...
Oh, shoot. Gonna be late.
Set me down next to the BX, please.
Uh... I can't do that, sir.
I have to land on the designated pad.
translation.de: Ich muss auf dem Landeplatz landen.

translation.en: I am telling you to do it, so you can do it.
translation.de: Ich befehle es, also dürfen Sie es.

translation.en: I have a congressional delegation down there waiting for me.
Um, it's only another 100 yards, sir,
and I'm sure you're gonna do great with the delegation, even if you are a minute late.
translation.de: Sie kommen mit der Delegation auch eine Minute später zurecht.

translation.en: Thin ice, Captain.
Thin ice.
Hey, General? General. A word.
-I'm late for a meeting. -I ran the numbers,
translation.de: Ich bin spät dran. Ich kann die Bowlingbahn nur unters Zyklotron bauen,

translation.en: and I can't put the bowling alley under the cyclotron
translation.de: Ich kann die Bowlingbahn nur unters Zyklotron bauen,

translation.en: unless the bowling alley is curved,
-and I don't see how that works. -Get it done.
-I have complete confidence in you, ma'am. -Okay, it's Kelly.
It's Kelly.
-Oh. Nice of you to join us. -My apologies.
Had a little chopper trouble.
So, uh, what's good here?
I would recommend the tuna.
How much are taxpayers paying to fly that in?
translation.de: Wie viel zahlen die Steuerzahler dafür?

translation.en: A sandwich.
I knew that. It was a joke.
translation.de: Ich weiß, das war ein Witz.

translation.en: And a good one. But with a grain of truth.
Kick Grabaston at Air Force told us confidentially that this base was a complete waste of money.
translation.de: Kick Grabaston von der Air Force hält diese Basis für Geldverschwendung.

translation.en: Ladies and gentlemen, I assure you we are on track,
translation.de: Meine Damen und Herren, wir sind auf Kurs.

translation.en: and Epsilon will launch at 1700 hours.
And the Epsilon is the new spacecraft fighter, right?
translation.de: Epsilon ist der neue Raumjäger, oder?

translation.en: That is correct.
What kind of armament will it have on board? Laser cannon? Pulse weapon?
I believe those are from Star Wars.
Yep.
But if I had a laser cannon,
I would probably use it to cook a Wendy's hamburger.
The Epsilon is equipped with a kinetic disabling system.
translation.de: Die Epsilon hat ein kinetisches Deaktivierungssystem.

translation.en: -Meaning? -It can eject a metal net,
and it is our hope that we can get this net to tangle with enemy satellites.
translation.de: Wir hoffen, dass wir in diesem Netz feindliche Satelliten verheddern können.

translation.en: Exploding them?
Tangling them.
This better be one fucking flawless launch.
translation.de: Ich hoffe, wenigstens das Essen ist makellos.

translation.en: Six billion for a net. Not a good look.
translation.de: Sechs Milliarden für ein Netz sehen nicht gut aus.

translation.en: -[cell phone buzzing] -Oh, sorry. Excuse me.
Oh, God. I have to take this.
Dad, is everything all right?
Yeah, only your mom has run off again.
I can't see her. I'd run after her,
but I think I had a small heart attack this morning.
translation.de: aber ich hatte heute einen kleinen Herzinfarkt.

translation.en: You know, I'm feeling a little draggy.
Okay, Dad, is the caretaker there? Please put the caretaker on.
translation.de: Dad, ist der Pfleger da? Gib mir den Pfleger.

translation.en: He's on his way. He should be here any minute.
translation.de: Er kommt. Er ist gleich hier.

translation.en: So how's the lady situation?
translation.de: Wie läuft es mit den Frauen?

translation.en: [sighs] Well, as you know, my wife is in prison.
translation.de: Na ja, meine Frau ist im Gefängnis.

translation.en: Uh-huh. You know what I had to do yesterday? I had to crawl under the house to check a leak.
translation.de: Gestern musste ich unters Haus kriechen, um ein Leck zu finden.

translation.en: No, Dad. Dad, don't do--
We have people to crawl under the house, Dad.
translation.de: Wir haben Leute, die unters Haus kriechen.

translation.en: I crawled under. I didn't tell anybody, and they didn't know I was under there.
translation.de: Ich sagte es keinem. Keiner wusste, dass ich da war.

translation.en: Oh, my God. Oh, my God.
Please, Dad, don't, don't-- Don't crawl under the house!
translation.de: Bitte, Dad, krieche nicht unters Haus!

translation.en: So how's things? How's your-- How's your wife?
translation.de: Also, wie geht es deiner Frau?

translation.en: She's fine.
Yeah, you two are gonna make a great couple.
translation.de: Ja, ihr zwei werdet ein tolles Paar.

translation.en: -Is the caretaker there, Dad? -Uh, yeah.
-What are you doing? -Put the caretaker on.
-Have to get in the house. -What? -Put the caretaker on. -Get in the house.
He wants to talk to you.
Oh, God. I don't know what to do.
Your father should be in the hospital.
Your mama is somewhere in the streets in her nightgown.
translation.de: Ihre Mama rennt irgendwo im Nachthemd rum.

translation.en: Can you come home and help me?
I wish I could, Jean Baptiste, but I'm having kind of a day of it myself.
translation.de: Geht nicht. Ich habe einen harten Tag.

translation.en: And, please, don't let my dad go under the house again.
translation.de: Lassen Sie meinen Dad nicht wieder unters Haus.

translation.en: I try. You know he do whatever he want.
-No, no, no, no! -Ask him...
You have to keep eyes on him. Do you understand?
translation.de: Behalten Sie ihn im Auge, verstanden?

translation.en: -Yes, Mr. Naird. -Ask him how his wife is.
-How is your wife? -Ugh, God. All right, hold on a second, Jean Baptiste.
translation.de: -Wie geht es Ihrer Frau? -Gott. Moment, Jean Baptiste.

translation.en: Brad, I'm going to need you to task the satellite
-over Nutley, New Jersey, again. -Yes, I'm on it.
She's in the Rite-Aid parking lot.
-Text me when she's in the car. -Okay. Thank you, Mr. Naird.
[man] Oh, he is blowing it just like you thought.
Yeah, it is a complete shit show.
My dry cleaner.
Yeah, yeah, they, uh, they lost my dress whites.
translation.de: Sie haben meine weißen Hemden verloren.

translation.en: -I canceled the launch. -[gasps]
[panting] Mallory's waiting for you. -He said not to say anything. -Thank you, Brad.
-I didn't say anything. -Well done, Bradley.
-Oh, thank you, sir. -[Mark exhales]
It's a six-billion-dollar decision.
translation.de: Es ist eine $6 Milliarden teure Entscheidung.

translation.en: We can't risk it.
It's a lot for a scientist, but in the military, we have to risk lives.
translation.de: Im Gegensatz zu Wissenschaftlern müssen Soldaten Leben riskieren.

translation.en: At 50 grand a year,
it would take 120,000 years to earn $6 billion.
translation.de: braucht man 120.000 Jahre, um $6 Milliarden zu verdienen.

translation.en: That is the entire lifetime earnings of 3,000 people.
translation.de: Das sind die Lebenseinkünfte von 3000 Menschen.

translation.en: Now, how many times can a country waste the entire lifetime earnings
translation.de: Nun, wie oft kann ein Staat die Lebenseinkünfte

translation.en: of thousands of its citizens without something really bad happening?
translation.de: tausender Bürger verschwenden, ohne dass es katastrophal endet?

translation.en: Are you still upset about the button covers?
translation.de: Sind Sie noch sauer wegen der Knopfgehäuse?

translation.en: A thousand dollars for a plastic button cover?
That's insane!
-So you think we'll be ready by Novem-- -[button clicks]
-[automated voice] Three. -[alarms blaring]
-Two. -Shit.
One.
Sorry.
How many times do I need to apologize?
translation.de: Wie oft muss ich mich entschuldigen?

translation.en: Just come out to the launch site and we'll show you.
translation.de: Kommen Sie einfach zum Startplatz, dann zeigen wir es Ihnen.

translation.en: The proper humidity for launch is 40 percent.
Today it is at 54 percent.
This can affect oxygenation and fuel burn.
The amount of fuel measured is very precise.
If fuel is insufficient, the rocket returns to Earth without reaching orbit.
translation.de: Ohne Treibstoff erreicht die Rakete die Umlaufbahn nicht.

translation.en: Where you from, Chan?
-Ohio. -Originally?
What does that have to do with any-- Are--
translation.de: Was spielt das für eine Rolle?

translation.en: Are you suggesting Chan is a Chinese spy?
translation.de: Legen Sie nahe, dass Chan ein chinesischer Spion ist?

translation.en: Ah. So we have heard from Mr. Chan.
translation.de: Wir haben von Mr. Chan gehört.

translation.en: -Doctor. -Dr. Chan.
I'd like to hear another opinion. Perhaps somebody willing to dissent from the party line.
translation.de: Ich möchte andere Meinungen hören. Weicht jemand von der Parteilinie ab?

translation.en: Who'd like to give me a good reason why we should launch today?
translation.de: Wer nennt einen guten Grund, heute zu starten?

translation.en: Anyone?
So I can weigh the pros and cons?
Don't you have any mavericks on your team, Mallory?
translation.de: Haben Sie keine Querdenker im Team, Mallory?

translation.en: -I say launch. -Great.
And you are Dr....
Just call me Eddie. -Oh, shit. -Ain't a doctor.
I go to a bunch of 'em, though.
Wonderful. So those in favor of postponement
are me and Dr. Chan, Dr. Swedberg,
Dr. Washington, and Dr. Zisk.
In favor of launch are you and Eddie.
translation.de: Für den Start sind: Sie und Eddie.

translation.en: Any last name, Eddie? None that I care to mention.
translation.de: -Haben Sie einen Nachnamen? -Keinen, den ich sagen will.

translation.en: Chan, what's behind your back?
It's an umbrella, sir.
Did you think it was a sword cane? Samurai sword?
translation.de: Dachten Sie, es wäre ein Samurai-Schwert?

translation.en: Would you like to examine it, sir?
No, we are done here.
[Mallory] So the launch is scrubbed?
I can't hear you over the rotors.
translation.de: Ich höre Sie nicht, wegen der Rotoren!

translation.en: -Well, this is absurd. -[chattering]
So is this actually happening or not?
There's no point if it's not happening...
Excuse me, congresspeople.
Brad...
no interruptions for five minutes.
[softly] ♪ Aruba, Jamaica Ooh, I wanna take ya ♪
translation.de: Aruba, Jamaika Da will ich mit dir hin

translation.en: ♪ Bermuda, Bahama Come on, pretty mama ♪
♪ Key Largo, Montego Baby, why don't we go? ♪
translation.de: Key Largo, Montego Baby, warum nicht?

translation.en: ♪ Jamaica, off the Florida keys ♪
♪ There's a place called Kokomo ♪
translation.de: Es gibt einen Ort namens Kokomo

translation.en: ♪ That's where you wanna go To get away from it all ♪
translation.de: Da willst du hin Um dem Alltag zu entfliehen

translation.en: ♪ Bodies in the sand ♪
♪ Tropical drinks melting in your hand ♪
translation.de: Tropische Drinks schmelzen in deiner Hand

translation.en: ♪ We'll be falling in love To the rhythm of a steel drum band ♪
translation.de: Wir werden uns verlieben Zum Rhythmus einer Steelband

translation.en: ♪ Down in Koko-- ♪
They're gone.
Congresspeople! Congresspeople!
The launch is on.
-What? -See you at 1700.
But you--
Sheila? Yeah.
Okay. Okay, okay. Okay. Okay.
Don't, don't-- Please don't skitter away.
Please, this is for your own safety.
Come on. I'm trying to save you! Damn it, get back here.
translation.de: Ich will euch retten! Kommt, verdammt!

translation.en: Our country, the oldest democracy in the world,
translation.de: Unser Land, die älteste Demokratie der Welt,

translation.en: put a man on the moon.
It was perhaps our greatest moment up until that point.
translation.de: Es war bis dato unser vielleicht größter Moment.

translation.en: Alongside the Constitution, the Bill of Rights,
translation.de: Neben der Verfassung und den Grundrechten.

translation.en: and, of course, the Miracle on Ice.
Today we launch Epsilon 6,
a collaborative effort between the scientists of the United States,
translation.de: eine Zusammenarbeit von Wissenschaftlern aus den USA,

translation.en: Japan, Europe, Turkey, Israel, Australia, -and our old enemy, Russia. -[phone camera clicks]
translation.de: Japan, Europa, Türkei, Israel, Australien und dem alten Feind Russland.

translation.en: And this will bring us one step closer to returning to the moon,
translation.de: Es bringt uns der Rückkehr zum Mond näher,

translation.en: and, from there, to Mars.
There will be setbacks along the way.
There are risks to every great endeavor.
But greatness was never won without suffering.
translation.de: Aber Größe wurde nie ohne Leiden

translation.en: And sacrifice.
I am so, so damn proud of all of you.
translation.de: Ich bin so verdammt stolz auf Sie alle.

translation.en: [chuckling] Oh, my God. He's really on the edge.
translation.de: Oh mein Gott. Er dreht gleich durch.

translation.en: [clears throat] So...
without further ado,
with this button,
I so launch...
Epsilon 6.
-Liked the Miracle on Ice reference. -Thank you, Brad.
Aw. I should be tweeting this.
Where'd it go?
[whispering] What's going on? Did it blow up?
Not yet.
Epsilon 6 is in orbit.
Yeah, well, he'll probably have me transferred tomorrow
translation.de: Er wird mich sicher morgen versetzen lassen,

translation.en: once he has a moment to think about it.
[scoffs] But what was I supposed to do?
You put a helicopter down in the wrong spot,
translation.de: Wenn ich am falschen Ort lande,

translation.en: and someone could get their head removed.
Hang on a second, Mom.
"Sorry I snapped at you. Glad you're on our team."
translation.de: "Entschuldigen Sie meinen Rappel. Schön, Sie im Team zu haben."

translation.en: [Mallory] You know, there's one thing that I don't get.
You were right about the launch,
translation.de: Sie hatten recht mit dem Start,

translation.en: yet you don't know anything about science.
translation.de: obwohl Sie nichts von Wissenschaft verstehen.

translation.en: Guess I know a little about people.
When we we're out at the launch site, there were two tiny clouds in the sky.
translation.de: Am Startplatz waren zwei kleine Wolken am Himmel.

translation.en: Chan had an umbrella.
People like that can't handle any risk at all.
There's no way we are getting back to the moon
translation.de: Wir werden nie zum Mond zurückkehren,

translation.en: with that kind of thinking.
That's a good observation. Well reasoned.
Cheers.
Thank you, Doctor.
You know what?
Epsilon should be passing right about now.
-[Mark sighs] -Do you see it?
Oh, yeah, there's a spark.
Beautiful. Wow.
[Mark] I got it.
[Mallory] Wait, is that a second spark?
translation.de: Moment. Ist das ein zweiter Funke?

translation.en: [inhaling sharply] Motherfucker!
♪ Aruba, Jamaica Ooh, I wanna take ya ♪ ♪ To Bermuda, Bahama Come on, pretty mama ♪
translation.de: IN LIEBEVOLLEM ANDENKEN AN FRED WILLARD

translation.en: ♪ I want to take you down to Kokomo ♪
